title: Is This the Declaration of a Boy Allegedly Molested by Michael Jackson?
subtitle: In the 1993 declaration given by 13-year-old "J. Chandler" in a lawsuit against Michael Jackson, the boy alleged the singer had sexually molested him.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The court declaration given by the 13-year-old boy Michael Jackson allegedly molested in 1993 has surfaced.
